verses.verse: So when David <S%H1732><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and full <S%H7646><s%> of days, <S%H3117><s%> he made <S%H4427><s%> <S%H853><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> king over <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And he gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

Now the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were numbered <S%H5608><s%> from the age <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and upward: <S%H4605><s%> and their number <S%H4557><s%> by their polls, <S%H1538><s%> man by man, <S%H1397><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

Of which, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were to set forward <S%H5329><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were officers <S%H7860><s%> and judges: <S%H8199><s%>

Moreover four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were porters; <S%H7778><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> praised <S%H1984><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with the instruments <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made, <S%H6213><s%> said David, to praise <S%H1984><s%> therewith.

And David <S%H1732><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> them into courses <S%H4256><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> namely, Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>
Of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> were, Laadan, <S%H3936><s%> and Shimei. <S%H8096><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Laadan; <S%H3936><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> was Jehiel, <S%H3171><s%> and Zetham, <S%H2241><s%> and Joel, <S%H3100><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei; <S%H8096><s%> Shelomith, <S%H8013><s%> and Haziel, <S%H2381><s%> and Haran, <S%H2039><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Laadan. <S%H3936><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei <S%H8096><s%> were, Jahath, <S%H3189><s%> Zina, <S%H2126><s%> and Jeush, <S%H3266><s%> and Beriah. <S%H1283><s%> These <S%H428><s%> four <S%H702><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei. <S%H8096><s%>

And Jahath <S%H3189><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the chief, <S%H7218><s%> and Zizah <S%H2125><s%> the second: <S%H8145><s%> but Jeush <S%H3266><s%> and Beriah <S%H1283><s%> had not many <S%H7235><s%> <S%H3808><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%> therefore they were <S%H1961><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> reckoning, <S%H6486><s%> according to their father's <S%H1><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath; <S%H6955><s%> Amram, <S%H6019><s%> Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> four. <S%H702><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amram; <S%H6019><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses: <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> was separated, <S%H914><s%> that he should sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the most holy things, <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto him, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> in his name <S%H8034><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
Now concerning Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> were named <S%H7121><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> were, Gershom, <S%H1648><s%> and Eliezer. <S%H461><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom, <S%H1648><s%> Shebuel <S%H7619><s%> was the chief. <S%H7218><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliezer <S%H461><s%> were, Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%> the chief. <S%H7218><s%> And Eliezer <S%H461><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%> but the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%> were very many. <S%H7235><s%> <S%H4605><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar; <S%H3324><s%> Shelomith <S%H8013><s%> the chief. <S%H7218><s%>

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> Jeriah <S%H3404><s%> the first, <S%H7218><s%> Amariah <S%H568><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> and Jekameam <S%H3360><s%> the fourth. <S%H7243><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel; <S%H5816><s%> Michah <S%H4318><s%> the first, <S%H7218><s%> and Jesiah <S%H3449><s%> the second. <S%H8145><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari; <S%H4847><s%> Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi. <S%H4187><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mahli; <S%H4249><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Kish. <S%H7027><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> daughters: <S%H1323><s%> and their brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> them.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi; <S%H4187><s%> Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> and Eder, <S%H5740><s%> and Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers; <S%H1><s%> even the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers, <S%H1><s%> as they were counted <S%H6485><s%> by number <S%H4557><s%> of names <S%H8034><s%> by their polls, <S%H1538><s%> that did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> from the age <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto his people, <S%H5971><s%> that they may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> forever: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> unto the Levites; <S%H3881><s%> they shall no <S%H369><s%> more carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> of it for the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof.

For <S%H3588><s%> by the last <S%H314><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the Levites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3881><s%> were numbered <S%H4557><s%> from twenty years old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and above: <S%H4605><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> their office <S%H4612><s%> was to wait on <S%H3027><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the courts, <S%H2691><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> the chambers, <S%H3957><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> the purifying <S%H2893><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> holy things, <S%H6944><s%> and the work <S%H4639><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%>

Both for the shewbread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H4635><s%> and for the fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and for the unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes, <S%H7550><s%> and for that which is baked in the pan, <S%H4227><s%> and for that which is fried, <S%H7246><s%> and for all manner <S%H3605><s%> of measure <S%H4884><s%> and size; <S%H4060><s%>
And to stand <S%H5975><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%> to thank <S%H3034><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and likewise <S%H3651><s%> at even; <S%H6153><s%>

And to offer <S%H5927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> burnt sacrifices <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> in the new moons, <S%H2320><s%> and on the set feasts, <S%H4150><s%> by number, <S%H4557><s%> according to the order <S%H4941><s%> commanded unto <S%H5921><s%> them, continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And that they should keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> their brethren, <S%H251><s%> in the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
